title: Spells
content:
Spells are a big part of King’s Deck. They are powerful enhancements and attacks that benefit you greatly! Every spell has a different point cost and effect, so be wary when building your deck. See the list below for available spells – there are more to come!

Fireball (6 points): Destroy any non-king target.
Pawn Storm (3 points): Lets you move any one pawn two squares, even after it has already been moved.
